smash-karts.title: Smash Karts
smash-karts.slogan: Smash your way to victory in Smash Karts!
smash-karts.description: Smash Karts is a thrilling 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up your friends for endless fun!

HomeIframe.title: Welcome to Smash Karts
HomeIframe.description: Join the ultimate kart battle in Smash Karts! Use items and power-ups to outlast your opponents.

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Smash Karts is an awesome multiplayer io game where you drive karts through an arena and try to blow up other players with different weapons! You can collect a variety of wacky weapons as you race across the map.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Drive your kart and navigate through the arena.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Collect power-ups and weapons to gain an edge.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Destroy other karts to win the match.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Compete with players from around the world.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Use a wide range of weapons to blast your opponents.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Personalize your kart designs and skins.
